description: Write fundamental unit for real quadratic field of discriminant n as x + y*omega; sequence gives values of y for n == 3 mod 4.
comments: Entries are indexed by values of n from A039957.
references: R. A. Mollin, Quadratics, CRC Press, 1996, Tables B1-B3.
mathematica: A039957 = Select[ Range[250], SquareFreeQ[#] && Mod[#, 4] == 3 & ]; A053375 = (NumberFieldFundamentalUnits[ Sqrt[#]][[1, 2, 2]] & ) /@ A039957 (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 04 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 06 2000
